author: potuz
content: And we had to choose 13 because we're not superstitious right?

author: paulhauner
content:
I saw an invalid payload in the last hour:

```    
Sep 01 05:43:01.174 DEBG Invalid execution payload               method: new_payload, slot: 3791915, proposer_index: 377679, graffiti: graffitiwall:795:322:#ffddbb, root: 0x85f5002422f28702a9572a2e0d4d75bfa5a44d86b19be6fde9a1c2ac9c136983, execution_block_hash: 0x99822b4c9cda291edfa822c6e4a6b096e7aabe364005b752b9dcae19d1a1fe79, latest_valid_hash: 0xd0c4aa5d78778a9f207af209e8fe548aaf645db0b7dc4c0a59874084d9ebf21d, validation_error: Some("could not apply tx 44 [0xede2cd1bc612c6e50bf8f075dcfae6cacaba8a943d13499a90df9dbb6812ad0b]: invalid transaction v, r, s values"), service: beacon
```

I believe this is the same validator that was producing invalid payloads with Erigon last week.

author: yperbasis
content: That's probably a separate issue from the one we fixed recently. I'll look into it.
